cards.prompt: Would you rather have the ability to fly or be invisible?
Would you rather always have to sing instead of speaking or dance everywhere you go?
Would you rather never be able to use a smartphone again or never be able to watch TV again?
Would you rather explore space or explore the deep ocean?
Would you rather live without music or live without movies?
Would you rather be able to speak all foreign languages or talk to animals?
Would you rather have unlimited free travel or never have to pay for food at restaurants?
Would you rather be too hot all the time or too cold all the time?
Would you rather lose your sense of taste or your sense of smell?
Would you rather live in the mountains or by the beach?
Would you rather have more time or more money?
Would you rather always be 10 minutes late or always be 20 minutes early?
Would you rather be able to teleport anywhere or read minds?
Would you rather live in the past or live in the future?
Would you rather never have internet again or never have air conditioning/heating again?
Would you rather be famous for something embarrassing or never be famous at all?
Would you rather be stuck on a broken ski lift or in a broken elevator?
Would you rather always wear wet socks or only be able to wash your hair once a year?
Would you rather control the weather or talk to animals?
Would you rather eat anything without gaining weight or need only one hour of sleep each day?
Would you rather always have the latest tech or the best clothes?
Would you rather never eat your favorite food again or eat it every meal?
Would you rather be a famous actor or musician?
Would you rather lose your sight or hearing?
Would you rather live without caffeine or sugar?
Would you rather have super strength or super speed?
Would you rather live in a world with no crime or no poverty?
Would you rather visit any country for free or live anywhere you want for free?
Would you rather never have homework again or be paid to do homework?
Would you rather be the funniest or the smartest person in the room?
Would you rather have unlimited respect or unlimited power?
Would you rather have a pause button for life or a rewind button?
Would you rather live without social media or video games?
Would you rather breathe underwater or survive in space?
Would you rather know all the secrets of the universe or have unlimited wealth?
Would you rather spend a year in the desert or Arctic?
Would you rather have your dream job but low pay or boring job with high pay?
Would you rather never age physically or never age mentally?
Would you rather change the past or see the future?
Would you rather spend a day with a celebrity or fictional character?
Would you rather run as fast as a cheetah or swim as fast as a dolphin?
Would you rather have perfect hair or perfect skin?
Would you rather have a robot assistant or a self-driving car?
Would you rather live in a big city or small town?
Would you rather eat only sweet food or only savory food?
Would you rather play every musical instrument or master every sport?
Would you rather always know when someone’s lying or get away with lying?
Would you rather never do chores again or never pay bills again?
Would you rather be a master chef or master artist?
Would you rather control fire or control water?
Would you rather win $1M now or $100k every year for 20 years?
Would you rather always have the perfect comeback or get the last word?
Truth: What's your biggest fear in a relationship?
Dare: Give your partner a compliment right now.
Truth: What's one thing you’ve never told me?
Dare: Do your best dance move for 10 seconds.
Truth: What was your first impression of me?
Dare: Hug your partner for 30 seconds straight.
Truth: What’s your dream vacation with me?
Dare: Speak in a silly accent for the next 3 cards.
Truth: What’s your most embarrassing moment?
Dare: Pretend to be me for 1 minute.
Truth: Who was your first crush?
Dare: Whisper something sweet to me.
Truth: What’s your favorite feature of mine?
Dare: Do 10 jumping jacks.
Truth: If we could live anywhere, where would it be?
Dare: Hold hands until your next turn.
Truth: What’s a habit of mine you love?
Dare: Say ‘I love you’ in a funny voice.
Truth: Have you ever lied to me?
Dare: Tell me one thing you want us to do together.
Truth: What’s a movie you love but never told me about?
Dare: Try to make me laugh without touching me.
Truth: What’s the best date we’ve had?
Dare: Do an impression of your favorite celebrity.
Truth: Have you ever kept a secret from me?
Dare: Compliment me without using the word ‘love’.
Truth: What’s a childhood dream you had?
Dare: Describe our relationship in one word.
Truth: Do you believe in love at first sight?
Dare: Tell me something you appreciate about me.
Truth: What’s my most attractive quality?
Dare: Share your favorite memory of us.
Truth: Would you change anything about me?
Dare: Say three nice things about me.
Truth: What’s my favorite color?
Dare: Imitate an animal until I guess it.
Truth: What’s one thing you want to try with me?
Dare: Take a silly selfie together.
Truth: Have you ever dreamed about me?
Dare: Let me choose your next move.
Truth: What’s the funniest thing I’ve done?
Dare: Draw a heart on my hand.
Truth: What’s my favorite food?
Dare: Make up a song about me.
Truth: Do you prefer kissing or hugging?
Dare: Spin around 5 times.
Truth: What’s your love language?
Dare: Do a dramatic movie scene.
Truth: What’s my favorite hobby?
Dare: Tell me something in a whisper.
Truth: What do I do that makes you smile?
Dare: Hold eye contact with me for 10 seconds.
